concept.description: Labels all test methods annotated by "org.junit.Test" with TEST and JUNIT4 and applys these labels also to the surrounding classes.
concept.cypher: MATCH (t:CLASS)-[:CONTAINS]->(m:METHOD)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->(a:CLASS) WHERE a.FQN="org.junit.Test" SET m:TEST:JUNIT4, t:TEST:JUNIT4 RETURN t
